examples: that's the size of the situation
she hates me, that's about the size of it

results.definition: any glutinous material used to fill pores in surfaces or to stiffen fabrics
examples: size gives body to a fabric
he blanched when he saw the size of the bill
the only city of any size in that area

results.definition: cover or stiffen or glaze a porous material with size or sizing (a glutinous substance)
make to a size; bring to a suitable size
the physical magnitude of something (how big it is)
examples: a wolf is about the size of a large dog

results.definition: the property resulting from being one of a series of graduated measurements (as of clothing)
